snippet: Guo Yushan is the latest of dozens of people rounded up in China against a backdrop of pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong.
abstract: China detains scholar and rights advocate Guo Yushan as pro-democracy demonstrations in Hong Kong continue.
lead_paragraph: Guo Yushan is the latest of dozens of people rounded up in China against a backdrop of pro-democracy protests in Hong Kong.
